overview_of_class: This course is designed as the continuation of Chinese 214 in order to complete the training of basic Business Chinese. In addition to introducing more Chinese business lexicons and more language styles used in Chinese business culture, this course features training students to engage more in tasks that are relatively complicated and crucial to corporate operations, such as conducting market research, discussing marketing strategy and investment environment, dealing with disputes, producing formal business correspondence and business report, negotiation, etc.
name: Chinese IV: Chinese in Business Practice II
subject: CHINESE
